menu.name: Albums
menu.menudata: select tracks.year,case when tracks.year>0 then tracks.year else 'Unknown' end from tracks where tracks.audio=1 group by tracks.year order by tracks.year asc

menu.name: Songs
menu.menudata: select albums.id,albums.title from tracks,albums where tracks.audio=1 and albums.id=tracks.album and tracks.year={year} group by albums.id order by albums.titlesort
select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks,albums where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.album={album} and tracks.year={year} group by tracks.id order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc
